message.name: SMURF_GLOBAL_STATS
message.field: Target System ID.
Target Component ID.
Robot clock value at time of measurement in ns.
The total mumber of messages routed in.
The total mumber of messages routed out.
The total mumber of bytes routed in.
The total mumber of bytes routed out.
Number of messages that could not be routed.
80 percentile routing latency (for the last messages up to 1024 messages).
90 percentile routing latency (for the last messages up to 1024 messages).
Max routing latency (for the last messages up to 1024 messages).

message.name: SMURF_LINK_STATS
message.field: Target System ID.
Target Component ID.
Robot clock value at time of measurement in ns.
Name of this link.
The total mumber of messages from that link.
The total mumber of messages to that link.
The total mumber of bytes from that link.
The total mumber of bytes to that link.

message.name: SMURF_SYSTEM_COMPONENT_STATS
message.field: Target System ID.
Target Component ID.
Robot clock value at time of measurement in ns.
Statistics for this System ID.
Statistics for this Component ID.
The total mumber of messages from that link.
The total mumber of messages to that link.
The total mumber of bytes from that system/component.
The total mumber of bytes to that system/component.
Robot clock value at time of validity (TOV) the last ping received.
Last ping roundtrip time (RTT) from the router.

message.name: SMURF_STATS_REQUEST
message.field: Target System ID.
Target Component ID.
Bitfield of statistics to include.
